text: The Calm Sea is an 1869 painting by Gustave Courbet. Done in oil on canvas, the seascape depicts a beach on the Normandy coast stretched out before the English Channel. The painting is in the collection of the Metropolitan Museum of Art. == References == Category:1869 paintings Category:Paintings by Gustave Courbet Category:Paintings of the Metropolitan Museum of Art Category:Water in art
title: The Calm Sea (painting)
